Text: Wow, this was a pretty lame movie. Not worth downloading, your average episode of frontline is more factual than this soundbyte-ridden wannabe documentary.

cheecheeo you are a dumbo. this is an awesome documentary. it is not trying -like the news- the pseudo-objectivity game. it wears its bias on its sleeve, like an honest high quality documentary should. obviously you don't agree with it and that is why you are dissing. but that don't mean it is untruthful. naive, maybe. it means you are a nitwit. and this is a great film! I do think the title is a bit too much though.
